parameters.name: HelpFile
parameters.description: Name of the Help file that contains the Help topic

parameters.name: HelpTopic
parameters.description: ID of Help topic to display

title: ISldWorks.ShowHelp
signature:
void ShowHelp( 
   System.String
HelpFile
,
   System.Int32
HelpTopic
)

parameters.name: HelpFile
parameters.description: Name of the Help file that contains the Help topic

parameters.name: HelpTopic
parameters.description: ID of Help topic to display

remarks:
You can use this method with
ISldWorks::AddCallback
to implement Interactive What's New for your add-in.
